function NPC_7501003:Init(NPCID) --[[ User Data 1: Pain누적 데미지 --]] NPC_7501003.UD_Pain = 1 NPC_7501003.UD_Shield = 2 NPC_7501003.UD_DATASIZE = 2
NPC_ReserveUserData(NPCID, NPC_7501003.UD_DATASIZE)
NPC_7501003.LIMIT_Shield = 300 NPC_7501003.TALENT_ShieldCharging = 250100330 NPC_7501003.TALENT_BreakShield1 = 250100333 NPC_7501003.TALENT_BreakShield2 = 250100334 NPC_7501003.TALENT_Blink = 250100321
NPC_7501003.Executioner = 501004 NPC_7501003.TALENT_WHIRLWIND = 250100220 NPC_7501003.BUFF_Shield1 = 40770 NPC_7501003.BUFF_Shield2 = 40771
NPC_7501003.MODE_Blink = 1
end
function NPC_7501003:SpawnExecutioner( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Executioner = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_7501003.Executioner, ThisNPC:GetPos() ) Executioner:Assist(ThisNPC)
ThisNPC:SetTarget(Executioner)
-- Do reaction --ThisNPC:ClearJob() --ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7501003.TalIdPain1 ) end
function NPC_7501003:OnFinishShieldCharging( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local Executioner = ThisNPC:GetTarget()
ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7501003.TALENT_ShieldCharging )
if Executioner == nil or Executioner:IsNull() or Executioner:IsDead() then return end
AsNPC(Executioner):UseTalentSelf( NPC_7501003.TALENT_WHIRLWIND ) end
function NPC_7501003:OnCancelShieldBreak( ThisActor, Enemy ) -- GLog("NPC_7501003:OnCancelShieldBreak") local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) -- ThisNPC:SayNow("NPC_7501003:OnCancelShieldBreak") ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7501003.TALENT_BreakShield2 ) end
function NPC_7501003:OnActShieldBreak2( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_7501003.BUFF_Shield1 ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_7501003.BUFF_Shield2 ) end
function NPC_7501003:OnActBlink( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) local Target = ThisNPC:Aggro("random", 0)
ThisNPC:RemoveAllBuff() ThisNPC:MoveToActor( Target, -1 ) --ThisNPC:SayNow("ActBlink") end
function NPC_7501003:AccDamage( ThisNPC, HitInfo )
--ThisNPC:SayNow("Mode "..ThisNPC:GetMode()) --[[ if ThisNPC:GetMode() == NPC_7501003.MODE_Blink or ThisNPC:GetCurrentTalent() == NPC_7501003.TALENT_Blink then HitInfo.Damage = 0 return HitInfo end --]] -- 어둠의 보호막 버프 처리 --[[ if ThisNPC:CheckBuff( NPC_7501003.BUFF_Shield1 ) then HitInfo.Damage = HitInfo.Damage / 10 return HitInfo elseif ThisNPC:CheckBuff( NPC_7501003.BUFF_Shield2 ) then HitInfo.Damage = 0 return HitInfo end --]] end
function NPC_7501003:OnHitCapsule_1_0( HitInfo ) return NPC_7501003:AccDamage( this, HitInfo ) end
function NPC_7501003:OnHitCapsule_2_0( HitInfo ) return NPC_7501003:AccDamage( this, HitInfo ) end
